channel.title: Comments on: IA Wants You to Pick a Location For Her!
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: By: Dorellymimi
item.dc:creator: Dorellymimi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ia-wants-you-to-pick-a-location-for-her/#comment-2">Kirigaya Nagisa</a>.
They post things almost simultaneously! Twitter was just the first one to do so, and the first one we found!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kirigaya Nagisa.

They post things almost simultaneously! Twitter was just the first one to do so, and the first one we found!

item.title: By: Kirigaya Nagisa
item.dc:creator: Kirigaya Nagisa
item.description: it was also posted in FB as well...
item.content:encoded: it was also posted in FB as well…
